	charset="iso-8859-1"

X-eGroups-Approved-By: clarkware <mike@...> via web; 08 Nov 2002 02:39:34 -0000

Greetings

I have recently upgraded to Ant 1.5.1 and this has resulted in an odd error
in JUnit XML test result logging. 

Specifically, JUnit seeks to use
com.sun.xml.parser.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl but is unable to instantiate
it. This class exists in parser.jar. Parser.jar exists in Ant's lib
directory, but not in the dist/lib directory. 

Crimson.jar contains another DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl. Crimson exists in
*both* the lib and dist/lib directory. But if I create a jaxp.properties
file that defines the system property
javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory as
org.apache.crimson.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl then Ant fails to run at
all... and I don't like this option.

Here is the error I receive when running the JUnit task:

execute-pure-tests:
    [junit] javax.xml.parsers.FactoryConfigurationError:
com.sun.xml.parser.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl
    [junit] 	at
javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance(DocumentBuilderFactory.
java:75)
    [junit] 	at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter.getDocu
mentBuilder(XMLJUnitResultFormatter.java:93)
    [junit] 	at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter.startTe
stSuite(XMLJUnitResultFormatter.java:138)
    [junit] 	at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.fireStartTestSu
ite(JUnitTestRunner.java:433)
    [junit] 	at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.run(JUnitTestRu
nner.java:279)
    [junit] 	at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.main(JUnitTestR
unner.java:524)
    [junit] Exception in thread "main" 
    [junit] TEST
com.qsipayments.business.authentication.AuthenticationCounterTest FAILED


Has anyone experienced (and resolved) a similar issue?
Does anyone know how I can configure JUnit (or is it Ant?) to find and use a
DocumentBuilderFactory implementation?

Regards
Jeremy Mawson
subject: Unable to find DocumentBuilderFactory
